704321f-b.title: Brooklyn: Flatbush Avenue - Avenue M
704321f-b.text:
(1)
Flatbush Ave., west side, between Aves., M. and P. The view
shows the old St. Thomas Aquinas R.C. Church.
August 7, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, from Hendrickson St., showing the rear and side views.
April 27, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

704323f-a.title: Brooklyn: Flatbush Avenue - Avenue M
704323f-a.text:
(1)
2041 Flatbush Ave., east side, between Ave. M. and Baughman Place,
built by Treadwell Abrams in 1867.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
(2)
The same, a further view north.
1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
